s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH PROTECTOR LH

atten4.ptxt: When installing the back door outside garnish protector LH, heat the back door outside garnish surface using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the back door outside garnish excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the back door outside garnish surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the back door outside garnish surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the back door outside garnish surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door outside garnish protector LH in the position shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH PROTECTOR RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR GARNISH MOULDING PROTECTOR LH

atten4.ptxt: When installing the back door garnish moulding protector LH, heat the back door outside garnish surface using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the back door outside garnish excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the back door outside garnish surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the back door outside garnish surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the back door outside garnish surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door garnish moulding protector LH in the position shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR GARNISH MOULDING PROTECTOR RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH PROTECTOR

atten4.ptxt: When installing the back door outside garnish protector, heat the back door outside garnish surface using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the back door outside garnish excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the back door outside garnish surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the back door outside garnish surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the back door outside garnish surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door outside garnish protector in the position shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH SEAL

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for both back door outside garnish seals.
When installing the back door outside garnish seal, heat the back door outside garnish surface using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the back door outside garnish excessively.

s2.ptxt: Clean the back door outside garnish surface.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the back door outside garnish surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the back door outside garnish surface.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new back door outside garnish seal in the position shown in the illustration.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH SUB-ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the back door outside garnish sub-assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL BACK DOOR OUTSIDE GARNISH SUB-ASSEMBLY RH

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s2.ptxt: Install the license plate light assembly while turning it as shown in the illustration.
Attach the 2 claws to the license plate light assembly.
